name: Verily
description:
Verily is an old style action RPG.

The only way out is through, and the deeper you go the tougher your foes become. Find hidden stashes of gold in secret places within the dungeon, or get it the old fashioned way by killing monsters. Use the gold to upgrade your character, allowing you to go deeper still into the dungeon.

Features:

  • A real-time action combat system with spells you have to aim, and an active parry system to block enemy attacks.
  • Over ten levels of dungeon diving.
  • Upgrade various aspects of your adventurer using the gold you find in the dungeon.
  • Over ten spells to unlock and use.
  • Programmer pixel art.
